def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    q = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = [i - 1 for i in p]
    q = [i - 1 for i in q]
    s = ["" for i in range(n)]
    for i in range(k):
        s[p[i]] = chr(ord("a") + i)
        s[q[i]] = chr(ord("a") + i)
    for i in range(k, n):
        s[p[i]] = s[q[i]] = s[p[i - 1]]
    print("YES")
    print("".join(s))

main()

def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    q = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = [i - 1 for i in p[:k]]
    q = [i - 1 for i in q[:k]]
    s = [None for i in range(n)]
    for i in range(k - 1):
        s[p[i]] = chr(ord("a") + i + 1)
        s[q[i]] = chr(ord("a") + i + 1)
    for i in range(k - 1, n):
        s[p[i]] = s[q[i]] = s[p[i - 1]] if s[p[i - 1]] is not None else s[q[i - 1]]
    print("YES")
    print("".join(s))

main()
n, k = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
p = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
q = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

if k == 1:
    print("YES")
    print(n * "a")
    exit(0)

letters = list(map(chr, range(97, 97 + k)))

s = [None] * n
s[p[0] - 1] = letters[0]
s[q[0] - 1] = letters[1]

for i in range(1, n):
    if s[p[i] - 1] is None:
        s[p[i] - 1] = s[p[i - 1] - 1]
    if s[q[i] - 1] is None:
        s[q[i] - 1] = s[q[i - 1] - 1]
    if s[p[i] - 1] == s[q[i] - 1]:
        print("NO")
        exit(0)

for i in range(k, n):
    s[p[i] - 1] = s[q[i] - 1] = letters[i % k]

print("YES")
print("".join(s))
